items.name: Logitech G604
items.description: So many buttons! Ever since I got a mouse with two side buttons, I never went back and kept looking for more. I keep looking I like having a A gaming mouse to go along with my gaming desktop

items.name: ikbc mf87 (White)
items.description: An 80% mechanical keyboard. Heavy as hell. If you ever drop this on your toe, it's a guaranteed hospital visit

title: Services
description: I'm a sucker for free stuff. Am I cheap or smart? Probably. But because of the abundance of free stuff out there, you don't have to spend a single peso. Most of the services listed here have a free plan.
